title: When the enemy insta - locks Yasuo

replies.body:
WHen the enemy instalocks Yasuo, you ought to grab Annie. Or Malzahar. Or Irelia. Or Akali. Or Talon.

Basically, what I'm saying is that instalocking Yasuo is bad because he has several matchups that leave him in a terrible place.

Anyone with a stun ruins him, even if it's a very short stun like Riven's third Q or her W.

Instalock Yasuo=Instant Happy face.

Instalock Yasuo?

Fuck his day up with Annie, Diana, or make a team with stupid amounts of CC.

> [{quoted}](name=Ralanr,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=oX7Y4AAv,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-01-04T21:26:47.594+0000)
>
> Instalock Yasuo?
> 
> Fuck his day up with Annie, Diana, or make a team with stupid amounts of CC.

Do you take ignite with annie or exhaust? ignite is better early, but exhaust is better late.

> [{quoted}](name=Ralanr,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=oX7Y4AAv,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2016-01-05T00:11:08.256+0000)
>
> I don't play Annie.
Would you rather go exhaust or ignite mid vs yauso?
